job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement responsive, intuitive user interfaces using frameworks such as React or Vue.js, ensuring a smooth, engaging user experience.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building user-facing software, which falls under Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop backend services and APIs using Django or Flask to handle data processing, AI model integration, and other key functionalities.
job_tasks.justification: Developing backend services and APIs is a fundamental aspect of Software Development, particularly for integrating AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with the AI and data science teams to integrate machine learning models into the application, ensuring efficient data flow and functionality between the frontend and backend.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI models into an application and managing data flow between different parts of the system is a key Software Development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up, manage, and optimize databases (SQL/NoSQL) for reliable and secure data storage and retrieval, supporting the AI model and other application features.
job_tasks.justification: Managing and optimizing databases for data storage and retrieval is a core component of Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously improve application performance, focusing on scalability, security, and user experience.
job_tasks.justification: Performance optimization, scalability, and security are all critical aspects of robust Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct thorough testing, troubleshoot issues, and implement fixes to ensure a high-quality, reliable product.
job_tasks.justification: Testing, debugging, and ensuring product reliability are standard Software Development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure that all application components comply with data privacy and security standards, such as GDPR, maintaining high standards of protection for user data.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance with data privacy and security standards is a crucial part of building secure and responsible software applications.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with the AI and data science teams
comply with data privacy and security standards, such as GDPR

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks like frontend, backend, API integration, database management, and general software engineering practices. While it mentions AI model integration, it lacks specific details about generative AI, LLMs, or advanced AI modeling techniques, which are characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.
